title: Account hacked then banned
body:
My account was hacked for about a month while i was on holiday and i only got it back 2 weeks ago, then 2 days ago my account got banned without any warnings.
Ive but in a ticket but no one has got back to me for a  few days now, which is quiet unfair as i haven't done anything to get banned
if i seem salty its because ive barley been able to play because of hack + ban

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you still not received a response to your ticket?

If not, could I please have your ticket number to have this looked into further.

Hey,
no i still haven't received a reply
the ticket id is 22963664
thank you
That's harsh man, hope it gets resolved. Bump
